WorkItem.Description:
Hi, 
Thank you! I tried that and it doesn't seem to be working. I can change the default for LESS files, but not coffeescript. I think a bug exists, unless someone else can change the default for coffeescript. I really do appreciate all you've done to make
 this tool possible for others. 


Best regards,
Chris

Sent from my iPad

On Mar 9, 2012, at 4:15 PM, "ploufs" <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:





From: ploufs


Yes, in config screen.

In visual studio menu tools

Item options

Node Chirpy

Node CoffeeScript
WorkItem.Summary: How to change myfilename.chirp.coffee to just myfilename.coffee?
